ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Portin'
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh...welcome : I too enjoy the fact that when exploring a new area with the armor I have worked so hard to get just might be lost just around the next bend.
ygData.messageBody:
Heh...welcome :>

I too enjoy the fact that when exploring a new area with the armor I have
worked so hard to get just might be lost just around the next bend.



> -----Original Message-----
> From: MLockridge01@... [SMTP:MLockridge01@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 18, 2001 8:27 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Portin'
>
> I am rather new to the game, but one of the things that fascinates me
> is the real sense of danger when I put my character in a new
> situation. Heart pounds, pulse rate goes up, I even get the shakes
> sometimes. I seldom get that in real life, even though I have a job
> that requires occasional physical combat.
>
> I love this game!
>
> Barto of Rivervale.
>
> --- In EverQuest@y..., LeSamLam@a... wrote:
> > As far as I know, there's only the port to the Dreadlands. I've
> never been
> > there. My husband went the other night and was scared to death.
> He just
> > took off running and made it safely but how I don't know. Just
> dumb luck.
> > He's a 30 mage now, was 28 then and everything he passed was
> conning red to
> > him. He said he will stick to the boats for a while.
> >
> > Lena
> >
> >
> > > Speaking of porting...how can I get a port to Kunark?
> > >
> > > Not Dreadlands...but closer to Cabilis
> > > and without taking the barrel barge?
> > >
> > > is there anywhere else that will get me into Kunark besides one
> of the boats
> > > or the DL port...please
> > >
>
>
